wikipedia_page.main: Christopher Taylor (18 October 1899 – 16 March 1972) was an English footballer. His regular position was as a forward. He was born in Kings Norton, Birmingham. He played for Redditch United, Hyde United, and Manchester United.

response: On 5 October, 2020, nearly a year after they almost cost him a contract at Bradford City, Taylor signed for Barrow on a short term contract.Barrow Complete Signing Of Chris Taylor"
